function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"A significant fraction of cases may go undetected with current testing algorithms, especially asymptomatic individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete quantification of viral titers due to lack of investigation on recovery rates for each step in the process.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variations in pmmov concentrations across samples without understanding the stability over time for the catchment population.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High prevalence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater samples indicating potential community spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on viral shedding in stool over the clinical course of the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on protocol without validation using expensive commercial kits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Potential presence of viral genomes in sewage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in viral load estimates in sewage and stool","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large variation in viral load in stool samples","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variation in viral signal degradation during storage at 4°c","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unstable sewage flow rate impacted by factors including rainstorms","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in pmmov levels across samples with a standard deviation of 1.34 c t units","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Testing viral enrichment process in sewage samples can pose a risk of exposure to viral contaminants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling sewage samples without proper pasteurization increases the risk of exposure to live viruses.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing and quantifying viral titers in wastewater samples involves the risk of accidental exposure to sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive signal for sars-cov-2 in wastewater samples indicates viral presence.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of sars-cov-2 genetic material in sewage poses a risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to testing for sars-cov-2 in the united states","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance of disease outbreaks in residential communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unrestricted access to disease data for public use may pose a risk of misinterpretation or misrepresentation, leading to panic or false conclusions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of non-peer-reviewed data for clinical practice may result in incorrect or harmful medical decisions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customization of dashboards and tracking of other countries may lead to biased data analysis or reporting, misrepresenting the true state of the outbreak.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High death rates in specific cities and regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exponential growth of cases in multiple countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in data formats and potential api failure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interactive web apps providing access to covid-19 data without coding.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Forecast model predicting high death toll.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing linear daily percent changes in confirmed cases and deaths in china.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Direct access to real-time epidemiological data can lead to misinformation and panic if the data is not accurate or properly interpreted.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of new variants of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of detailed viral surveillance at the genomic level","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of mutation and evolution of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixing measles, mumps, and rubella mmr vaccine to test for broad-spectrum viral immunity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drugs with potential side effects for covid-19 treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Knowledge gaps in understanding covid-19 and its differences from other viruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Infection of workers in slaughterhouses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of live virus in seafood markets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traces of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage water samples","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne routes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of virus on surfaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of environmental stability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Elderly population at higher risk of infection and mortality due to degeneration of immunity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Children at risk of severe symptoms due to kawasaki syndrome and artery diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher infection rate in younger population due to insufficient social distancing and mask protection.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased thrombotic and micro-vascular complications in severe covid-19 patients, leading to covid-19-associated coagulopathy cac","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invasion of the central nervous system by sars-cov-2, leading to neurological complications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Active infection of the digestive system by sars-cov-2, leading to gastrointestinal symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of sars-cov-2 infection mechanism and viral properties.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multi-organ infection and complications caused by sars-cov-2.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
